CHOPCHS.original: ~r~You shot the chopper down too early.~s~
Get within range of the ~r~target chopper.
Line your helicopter up with the ~r~target chopper.
CHOPCHS.translated: 将你的直升机与~r~目标~s~对齐。

CHOPCHS.original: Get close and move to the right of the ~r~target chopper~w~ to give Jacob a shot.
CHOPCHS.translated: 从右侧接近~r~目标~s~~n~给Jacob制造开火机会。

CHOPCHS.original: ~r~You lost the target.~s~
Fly south and locate the ~r~target chopper.
CHOPCHS.translated: 向南飞，寻找~r~目标直升机。

CHOPCHS.original: Get back into the ~b~helicopter.
~r~The target got away.~s~
Locate the ~r~target chopper.
Press ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_LEFT~ or ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_RIGHT~ to rotate the chopper left or right.
Follow the ~r~target choppper.
Press ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_LEFT~ or ~INPUT_VEH_FLY_YAW_RIGHT~ to rotate your helicopter.
Follow the ~r~target chopper,~s~ don't let it get away.
Use ~PAD_SIXAXIS_DRIVE~ to rotate your helicopter.
~r~You left Jacob behind, you couldn't get a shot on the chopper.~s~
Get into the ~b~helicopter.
Drop Jacob at the ~y~helipad~s~ off Union Drive East.
CHOPCHS.translated: 到Union快速路东段的~y~停机坪~s~放下Jacob。

CHOPCHS.original: ~r~The helicopter was destroyed.~s~
Drop Jacob at the ~y~helipad.
You're losing the ~r~target chopper.~s~ Don't let it get away.
CHOPCHS.translated: 你要跟丢~r~目标~s~了。别让它跑了。

CHOPCHS.original: Press ~INPUT_VEH_CIN_CAM~ to focus on the target chopper.
Keep your helicopter to the right so that Jacob can get a shot.
CHOPCHS.translated: 稳定在目标右侧来让Jacob射击。

CHOPCHS.original: Get back into the ~b~helicopter.
Line up your helicopter at the same height as the target.
The target is flying south through Liberty City.
CHOPCHS.translated: 目标正在飞越自由城南部上空。

CHOPCHS.original: Meet Jacob at the ~y~salvage yard~s~ off Grummer Road.
~r~Jacob is dead.~s~
Follow the target and wait for an opportunity to take down his helicopter.
CHOPCHS.translated: 跟随目标，伺机击落他的直升机。
